title: Fallin'
lyrics:
We are here now
We're about to start
Here we go!
What, what, what, what
What, we bring the fire, fire
What, what, what, what

What, we bring the fire, fire



U got answers, I got question

We gotta start it, get it action

I show u real, it ainâ€™t fiction

Babe focus on me like a meditation

Mag dallyeo ulin sege

Haneul-e dahge keuge

Usan ttawin gajda beolyeo

Make that rain more

Pour more pour more we get

Whip it whip it whip it



Ja bileul naelyeo hanchi apdo an boidolog

Oneul-eun budi ganjeolhan feelin'

Huin undonghwa i syeocheu jeonbu jeoj-eodo dwae

Meoli wi ontong ne mam-eun question



Chago neomchidolog fallin'

Meoggo chehal mankeum fallin'

Bwa ileon naui galjeung-eul neon algina hae?

Ja bileul naelyeo hwibsseullyeo tteonaelyeogadolog

Meoli wi ontong ne mam-eun question

Neon cham mumigeonjohae

Igeo salang majni question



Nanananana da ssod-abwabwa

Nanananana deo peobueobwa go

Nanananana da ssod-abwabwa

Nanananana deo peobueobwa go



Pick up the phone

Pick pick up the phone (brr)

Ni jeonhwa beonho nuleugo jeonhwaleul geol-eo

We have to go yes we have to go

Nae du son kkog jabgo eodideun

We have to go go

Oneul naege jibjung hou

Houjuuibo tteol-eojini focus

Jigyeobdeon uimi eobsdeon jiluhadeon

Pil-yo eobs-eo neoman issdamyeon



Ja bileul naelyeo hanchi apdo an boidolog

Oneul-eun budi ganjeolhan feelin'

Huin undonghwa i syeocheu jeonbu jeoj-eodo dwae

Meoli wi ontong ne mam-eun question



Chago neomchidolog fallin'

Meoggo chehal mankeum fallin'

Bwa ileon naui galjeung-eul neon algina hae?

Ja bileul naelyeo hwibsseullyeo tteonaelyeogadolog

Meoli wi ontong ne mam-eun question

Neon cham mumigeonjohae

Igeo salang majni question



Nanananana da ssod-abwabwa

Nanananana deo peobueobwa go

Nanananana da ssod-abwabwa

Nanananana deo peobueobwa go



Da ssod-abwabwa deo peobueobwa

Da ssod-abwabwa deo peobueobwa



Ja bileul naelyeo memaleun nae mam-eul chaewojwo

Oneul-eun budi ganjeolhan feelin'

Neolamyeon il nyeon naenae gyesog naelyeodo dwae

Meoli wi ontong ne mam-eun question



Chago neomchidolog fallin'

Meoggo chehal mankeum fallin'

Bwa ileon naui galjeung-eul neon algina hae?

Ja bileul naelyeo hwibsseullyeo tteonaelyeogadolog

Meoli wi ontong ne mam-eun question

Neon cham mumigeonjohae

Igeo salang majni
